Author: VeryEmbarresingAlt
Text: Yeaahhh, thanks. He's said things that made me very uncomfortable beyond weight tbh, like criticizing anything feminine too.   The thing is, I'm not really feminine, he just wanted to insult me. It's weird being a 15 year old and getting told "Oh, you're so fat, you have nice birthing hips you'd make a great wife" and shit.

Author: PumpkinTome
Text: It‘s terrible when family you are meant to trust seek to tear down any inkling of positive body image. And to relive it in dreams adds salt to the wound. I’ve been through the same. Sending internet love <3
